thread.section_title: Stateside Bead Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Stateside Bead Supply | www.statesidebeadsupply.com
thread.title: Sandee
thread.title_full: Stateside Bead Supply reviewed by Sandee

author: Sandee
title: Sandee
text:
I ordered magnetic beads for my 94 year old mother as a Birthday Present. Yes, my mom is still beading! I ordered a wide selection, and unfortunately one of the beads was no longer in stock. I was contacted prior to sending so that I could substitute if I wanted to. That was great customer service. The order went out as soon as they got my response.
The turn around time was great, and mom loves the beads.
I would definitely order from this company again.
